checks.note: EHT(2) + GW(2) の最小同時拘束チャネルを要求する。
EHT と GW で推定される高次係数が 3σ 以内で整合すること。
高次項導入が過剰自由度（AIC悪化）として即棄却されないこと。
高次項を採択するにはAICで有意改善（<=-2）を要求する。
EHT κ系統を圧縮再評価した後でも 3σ 判別必要精度に到達していること。
GW150914 の一次 strain 同型監査（H1/L1 相関）で pre-merger 同型を判定する。
GW multi-event H1/L1 振幅比監査で、単一イベント依存でない同型性を確認する。
GW250114 面積定理の合成有意度が 3σ 以上であること。
binary-pulsar 軌道崩壊（R-1）の独立チャネルが2系以上あること。
GW（合体）と pulsar（軌道崩壊）で λ_H proxy が 3σ 以内で整合すること。
Fe-Kα broad line の ISCO proxy で独立チャネルが3点以上あること。
GW（合体）と Fe-Kα/ISCO proxy で λ_H proxy が 3σ 以内で整合すること。

decision.rule: Reject if any hard gate fails; watch if only watch gates fail; otherwise pass.

aic_support_recovery_target.formula: delta_AIC = chi2_fit + 2*k - chi2_baseline; support requires delta_AIC <= -2 (k=1).
aic_support_recovery_target.note: z is the baseline standardized mismatch of additional independent channel(s). This is a planning estimator under additive-chi2 approximation.

aic_support_scenario_matrix.note: Current one-parameter lambda_H ansatz with fixed channels; if best_delta_aic > -2, support-gate watch cannot clear without new information/model change.

ansatz_extension_model_matrix.note: AIC support threshold is strict (<=-2 vs baseline k=0). If required_chi2_for_support_threshold < 0, no perfect fit can clear support for that parameter count.

assumptions: CMB peak observables use explicit amplitude-level mapping from pass branch.
If external a3_a1 sigma exists, infer Cov(A1,A3) and clamp to physical |rho|<=1.
If ratio sigma is propagated from peak sigmas, Cov(A1,A3)=0 is used.
covariance_summary.method: delta-method from shared peak amplitudes (A1, A3) -> lambda covariance for {l1,l3,a3a1}

mapping_policy.cluster: pmodel-corrected offset branch mapped as obs/pred-1 with sigma=obs_sigma/pred
mapping_policy.cmb: pass-branch pressure(+ruler) amplitudes/ratio mapped as obs/pred-1 with primary sigma (Planck binned or observed), threshold proxy only fallback

cross_domain_direct_mapping.note: Decision-grade direct mapping candidate set. Unlike proxy z injection, each row is represented as (lambda_obs, sigma_lambda) from explicit observable-level formulas; CMB off-diagonal covariance is added for shared A1/A3-derived ratio coupling.

rows.mapping: lambda = obs_amp/pred_amp - 1 ; sigma uses primary amplitude uncertainty (Planck binned/observed) with threshold fallback
lambda = obs_amp/pred_amp - 1 ; sigma uses primary amplitude uncertainty (Planck binned/observed) with threshold fallback
lambda = obs_amp/pred_amp - 1 ; sigma uses primary amplitude uncertainty (Planck binned/observed) with threshold fallback
lambda = ratio_obs/ratio_pred - 1 ; sigma uses primary ratio uncertainty (observed or propagated from peak sigmas) with threshold fallback

cross_domain_direct_projection.note: Decision-grade path: explicit per-observable mappings (lambda_obs, sigma_lambda) from cross-domain audits without z-proxy envelope; CMB peak/ratio off-diagonal covariance included.

cross_domain_high_tension_candidate_regi.note: Cross-domain candidates are tension proxies derived from already-fixed primary audits (frame-dragging scalar-limit, CMB uplift, Bullet offset). They are not direct lambda_H observables.

rows.note: Scalar-only frame-dragging branch is rejected by GP-B/LAGEOS; use max |z_scalar| as cross-domain tension proxy.
CMB baryon-only branch fails amplitude/ratio gates; normalize mismatches by pass thresholds to build a cross-domain z proxy.
Bullet proxy audit rejects baryon-only offset branch; use lens-anchor |z| mismatch as cross-domain tension proxy.

cross_domain_injected_trial_mapping.sigma_reference_policy: lambda_sigma(joint) -> median(sigma_lambda over all baseline channels)
cross_domain_injected_trial_mapping.sign_policy: dual-envelope (plus/minus); report both and select lower delta_aic projection

cross_domain_injection_projection.note: Dual-sign envelope projection for non-GW cross-domain candidates. Use only as planning proxy until direct lambda_H mapping is fixed per channel.

eht_kappa_readiness.note: Approximation uses sigma ~ 1/sqrt(N_indep). Required information multiplier is indicative for planning, not a strict experimental forecast.

eht_kappa_update_watchpack.note: kappa_ratio<=1 gate is rerun-triggered by primary-input hash updates. metadata-only changes are logged but do not increment the event counter.

gw_polarization_channel_readiness.note: GW polarization stage audit is treated as candidate-channel readiness only; it is not yet injected into lambda_H fit until stable multi-event usable set is available.

gw_polarization_high_tension_candidate_r.note: tensor_mismatch is a relative mismatch from GW polarization geometry audit, not a standardized z. Comparison against required_abs_z is a planning-only unit-scale proxy until a formal z-mapping is fixed.

gw_polarization_injected_trial_mapping.mapping_formula: z_mapped = clip(tensor_mismatch_median * sqrt(n_reject_tensor_events / n_usable_events) * sqrt(n_usable_events / n_events) * sqrt(tensor_mismatch_median / max(tensor_mismatch_median, scalar_mismatch_median)), 0, 5)
gw_polarization_injected_trial_mapping.sigma_reference_policy: lambda_sigma(gw_only) -> median(sigma_lambda over GW channels) -> median(sigma_lambda over all channels)
gw_polarization_injected_trial_mapping.sign_policy: sign(lambda_fit_gw_only - lambda_fit_joint_baseline) if available else sign(lambda_fit_gw_only)

gw_polarization_injection_projection.note: Injection projection uses physics-calibrated mismatch->z mapping; support decision remains based on baseline channels until physics-level z calibration is locked.

pass_if: All hard and watch gates pass with one shared lambda_H.
reject_if: Any hard gate fails (missing channels, inconsistent lambda across EHT/GW, or severe AIC overfit).
watch_if: Only watch-level gates fail (current precision/overlap limits).

intent: Constrain a minimal higher-order coefficient lambda_H from EHT+GW+Pulsar+Fe-Kα channels under one shared parameter and evaluate whether strong-field data currently support the extension after GW homology updates, GW area-theorem consistency, independent X-ray ISCO proxy integration, AIC-penalized ansatz-extension matrix diagnostics, and GW polarization high-tension candidate registry/physics-calibrated injection mapping, plus non-GW cross-domain high-tension integration with both proxy envelope and direct observable-level mappings, including CMB off-diagonal covariance and kappa-gate update-event watchpack.

model.fit_policy: single-parameter weighted least squares across EHT, GW, pulsar and X-ray ISCO channels
